metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9472 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The email gateway in RT (aka Request Tracker) 3.0.0 through 4.x before 4.0.23 and 4.2.x before 4.2.10 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU and disk consumption) via a crafted email.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
